about_the_game:
Super Cambur: The Sacred Orbs

Step into the Fruitiverse in Super Cambur: The Sacred Orbs, a classic turn-based RPG inspired by the golden age of the genre. Join Cambur, the fearless banana warrior, and a quirky band of fruity heroes as they embark on an epic quest to recover the Sacred Orbs and thwart a mysterious villain threatening their juicy world.

Key Features

🍌 Classic Turn-Based Combat: Relive the timeless thrill of strategic battles, where every move counts. Plan your attacks, manage resources, and unleash powerful abilities to outwit your enemies.


🍌 Rich, Nostalgic Storytelling: Immerse yourself in a heartfelt and humorous tale filled with unforgettable characters, charming dialogue, and unexpected twists.


🍌 Vibrant World to Explore: Travel through lush jungles, crystalline caverns, and mystical temples, each brimming with secrets, puzzles, and treasures waiting to be uncovered.



🍌 Fruitastic Party System: Build your dream team of fruity warriors, each with unique skills and customizable abilities to suit your playstyle.



🍌 Pixel-Perfect Art Style: Enjoy beautifully detailed pixel art and animations that bring the Fruitiverse to life with a modern twist on retro aesthetics.



🍌 Memorable Soundtrack: Lose yourself in an enchanting soundtrack that captures the spirit of classic RPG adventures.

Are you ready to peel back the layers of an epic adventure? The Sacred Orbs hold the key to saving the Fruitiverse, and it’s up to you to unite the fruits and defeat the looming darkness!

Super Cambur: The Sacred Orbs

Step into the Fruitiverse in Super Cambur: The Sacred Orbs, a classic turn-based RPG inspired by the golden age of the genre. Join Cambur, the fearless banana warrior, and a quirky band of fruity heroes as they embark on an epic quest to recover the Sacred Orbs and thwart a mysterious villain threatening their juicy world.

🍌 Classic Turn-Based Combat: Relive the timeless thrill of strategic battles, where every move counts. Plan your attacks, manage resources, and unleash powerful abilities to outwit your enemies.


🍌 Rich, Nostalgic Storytelling: Immerse yourself in a heartfelt and humorous tale filled with unforgettable characters, charming dialogue, and unexpected twists.


🍌 Vibrant World to Explore: Travel through lush jungles, crystalline caverns, and mystical temples, each brimming with secrets, puzzles, and treasures waiting to be uncovered.



🍌 Fruitastic Party System: Build your dream team of fruity warriors, each with unique skills and customizable abilities to suit your playstyle.



🍌 Pixel-Perfect Art Style: Enjoy beautifully detailed pixel art and animations that bring the Fruitiverse to life with a modern twist on retro aesthetics.



🍌 Memorable Soundtrack: Lose yourself in an enchanting soundtrack that captures the spirit of classic RPG adventures.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad @ 2.8 GHz or AMD Phenom X4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7770 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Phenom II X6
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7770 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Join Cambur and his fruity friends in this classic turn-based RPG! Explore vibrant worlds, battle quirky enemies, and recover the Sacred Orbs to save the Fruitiverse. A nostalgic adventure full of humor, strategy, and juicy battles awaits!
